column1: The Pit Room////Got the feast for my dads birthday
column2: and we loved it! There are so many different types of meat
column3: but our favorite was the beef rib. It was so tender and fatty
column4: and full of taste. Also loved the pulled pork and the sausages. Some of the cuts have a black pepper crusting
column5: which makes it slightly spicy. Even though it was a lot of food
column6: we heated up leftovers in the microwave oven and it was just as delicious!
